name: Nasha Market: Impenetrable Vault
description: A common two-story shopfront in Nasha Town, spacious and secure. Northland Bank has rented a similar establishment in town.\nSecurity is paramount to a bank. Despite being outwardly indistinguishable from other shops in town, its interior is an intricately built fortress, rigged with defenses and alarms guaranteed to teach trespassers a painful lesson...
